      • readFromConfig

        public static java.lang.Object readFromConfig(java.lang.String configName,
                                              ConfigUtils.SearchType type,
                                              java.lang.String path)
                                       throws ConfigurationNotFoundException
        Reads an object from a configuration file
        Parameters:
        configName - The name of the configuration
        type - The type of object to retrieve
        path - The path of the object to retrieve
        Returns:
        The object that was retrieved
        Throws:
        ConfigurationNotFoundException - Thrown if no configuration was found under the name given

                               java.lang.Object value)
                        throws ConfigurationNotFoundException
        Adds an object from a configuration file
        Parameters:
        configName - The name of the configuration
        path - The path of the object to set
        value - The object to set path to
        Throws:
        ConfigurationNotFoundException - Thrown if no configuration was found under the name given
